p: About 1.7 kg ground stems of Rauvolfia caffra were soaked with 2 L methanol for 48 h at room temperature. The methanol extract was filtered, and then concentrated using a rotary evaporator (BÜCHI Labortechnik AG, Flawil, Switzerland) at 50 °C to obtain 49.2 g of dried extract. The crude methanol extract (49.2 g) was subjected to column chromatography over silica gel [ 27].
